resources.string:
1. Accept our terms and conditions of pinning the map.

 2. Log-in via Facebook (we don’t see your login details so don’t be concerned with privacy issues).

 3. Click on “Pin Map”.

 4. Move the map with your finger until the pin is over a place where you want to make your announcement!

 5. Add a photo (optional), title and description.

 6. Choose a category for your pin.

 7. Add your email (optional) and a link to a website (optional).

 8. Preview your pin before submitting.

 9. Want to post to Facebook or Twitter at the same time? Just tick the boxes.

 10. Submit the ad then click on “View Map” to see your pin.
